about_the_game:
Drifting with Maxwell Cat The Game - is a thrilling skateboarding game that puts you in control of your favorite meme characters as they drift their way through wacky, obstacle-filled levels.
Customize and tune your skateboard to fit your playstyle, and rack up points as you slide past challenges and pull off epic stunts.
With a vibrant art style and intuitive controls, It is the ultimate blend of arcade action and customization.
Whether you're a seasoned skate pro or new to the scene, there's something for everyone in this meme-filled adventure.

Here's what you can expect:


  • Customize and fine-tune your skateboard to suit your playstyle
  • Rack up points as you slide past challenges and execute epic stunts
  • Enjoy a vibrant art style and intuitive controls
  • Play as a seasoned skateboarding pro or just starting out
  • Experience an entertaining, meme-filled adventure
  • So grab your board and get ready to shred!

name: Drifting with Maxwell Cat: The Game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: "Drifting with Maxwell Cat The Game" is a skateboarding game featuring meme characters navigating obstacle-filled levels. Customize your skateboard and pull off stunts to earn points. With vibrant art and intuitive controls, it's a fun arcade game for all skill levels.
